title: Shop Assistant / Cashier X2
description: To deliver service excellence through efficient customer service, point of sale (POS) operational activities and merchandising in store that leads to a positive customer experience.
responsibilities: Efficiently execute all operational activities at the point of sale in a timely and efficient manner
Maintain high levels of accuracy when scanning merchandise and collecting payment for goods purchased, including actioning clubcard rewards
Ensure the safe handling of cash at all times
Proactively promote the Clicks' clubcard and to enroll new clubcard members in order to achieve the clubcard participation targets
Make customers aware of promotions in order to positively affect sales and to ensure customers 'feel good and pay less'
Deliver superior customer service by acting as a brand ambassador, being visible and offering a friendly and professional service
Efficiently execute and maintain all merchandising and general housekeeping duties according to store and visual merchandise standards
Support the Group's vision to be the customer's first choice health and beauty retailer by living and driving the company values
Maintain updated knowledge on products, ranges, promotions and events in order to provide the correct information to customers at all times
qualifications: Maths 50% and English 50% at Grade 12 level (Desirable)
Experience in a customer facing role within a retail/FMCG store operations environment (Desirable)
Retail/FMCG background and understanding of merchandising and promotions principles
